Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2007 03:47AM sarahb wrote: Another thing as well that my mum has right now is an awful pain going from the "good" side of her neck, down the front of her chest. she describes it as a feeling like a trapped nerve. she has had chemo and radio. is this one of the side effects?? she has had the "all clear", but because of this pain, i think that she thinks there is something still wrong with her.
Posts.Title: After all surgery and treatment sarahb iodine

Posts.Content: sarahb wrote: Hi, im new to this site. I will try to be to the point!! Im really worried about my mum. she was diagnoised with breast cancer last year and has has her breast removed and had all her treatment. last week, she got her final results and got the all clear, but ever since that day, she has been acting very odd! she seems very confused in her conversation and also seems really distant. its like she is deep in her own though? almost like she is convinced she still has the cancer. is this normal? is she in shock? has anyone else had these symptoms? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: After all surgery and treatment sarahb iodine

Posts.Content: Dec 1, 2007 05:34AM sarahb wrote: Beesie, Many thanks for that reply, i found that to be helpful. Its even brought tears to my eyes!!! It must be so hard to except that you have been told your ok and basically "get on with your life now!!!" Thank you!
